pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū gāmakāvāse ekacīvarā cīvarakammaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:1.3: Bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisitvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:1.6: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:1.9: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:1.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:1.12: “Yā pana bhikkhunī anāpucchā ārāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:1.13: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena te bhikkhū tamhā āvāsā pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.3: Atha kho te bhikkhū punadeva taṃ āvāsaṃ paccāgacchiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.4: Bhikkhuniyo—“ayyā āgatā”ti āpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisitvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.5: upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā bhikkhuniyo te bhikkhū etadavocuṃ—“kissa tumhe, bhaginiyo, ārāmaṃ neva sammajjittha na pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpitthā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.7: “Bhagavatā, ayyā, sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ—‘na anāpucchā ārāmo pavisitabbo’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.10: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisituṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.11: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.12: “Yā pana bhikkhunī santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:2.13: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena te bhikkhū tamhā āvāsā pakkamitvā punadeva taṃ āvāsaṃ paccāgacchiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:3.3: Tāsaṃ kukkuccaṃ ahosi—“bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ—‘na santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmo pavisitabbo’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:3.4: Mayañcamhā santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisimhā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:3.5: Kacci nu kho mayaṃ pācittiyaṃ āpattiṃ āpannā”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:3.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:3.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:3.9: “Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā paviseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:4.1.6: sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassā ārocenti, te vā ārocenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:4.1.10: bhikkhuṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā ārāmikaṃ vā anāpucchā parikkhittassa ārāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:4.1.11: Aparikkhittassa ārāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:4.2.1: Sabhikkhuke sabhikkhukasaññā santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:4.2.2: Sabhikkhuke vematikā santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:4.2.3: Sabhikkhuke abhikkhukasaññā santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisati, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:4.3.5: yattha bhikkhuniyo sannipatitā honti tattha gacchati,
